message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're starting high, I'll meet you in the middle
I'm willing to compromise, but I want a slightly better deal
You're getting desperate, I'll take a small majority
I'm taking a stand, but I still want a better deal
You're not budging, I'll take what's left
I'll give you everything, but only if you agree to meet me in the middle
